Freight Helpdesk System

Streamline your shipping and logistics, enhance customer communication
and increase support productivity.
Contact Us Now!

Awesome user interface

Track, prioritise, and solve customer tickets.

Organise your Freight Helpdesk System the way you want with the amazing Kanban view.
Get an instant overview of your team’s workload and check the status of a ticket based on your custom tailored SLA rules.

What can you do with Freight Helpdesk?

Here's how the best helpdesk software system can help you from the get-go.

Boost Productivity

Set assignment rules to assign tickets as they come in, so your agents can jump into problem-solving in seconds.

Get Mobile Ready

Use mobile app for ticketing to allow managers to deliver timely updates on the spot.

24/7
Call Center

Our call centre is available 24/7. Freephone 0800 4273 37 to talk to one of our customer service representatives now.

Prioritise
Customer

Measure customer satisfaction to turn an unhappy customer into a happy one, and reward agents' performance.

Provide smarter
self-service

Build-in customer knowledge base.

Develop your self-service platform by directly linking your FAQ, training videos, and presentations on a ticket.
Develop a community around your product with the forum.

Optimised for productivity

SLAs, Automation, Templates, and Canned Responses.

Optimising your team's productivity:
Create your SLA rules and let us take action automatically.
Automate emails or actions at different stages of ticket progress.
Define dynamic email templates to automate the most common reponses.
Escalate tickets to your manager in just a click.
Invite other staff member into a live discussion.
Use canned reponses in live chat for instant answers.

Allow customers to
close their tickets

Grant autonomy. Improve productivity.

Reduce the chance of error, avoid misunderstandings and leave more
time for Helpdesk Teams to worry about what truly needs their attention.
